(All English is Google Translated from Japanese. ....
The grammar may be wrong)

4 * 4 short puzzle.
It's a mini game, so you can clear it in a few minutes.

Push the cursor into the panel and move it one by one.
It disappears when three of the same color are lined up.
Finally, finish the four black panels side by side.

(You can return to the menu by pressing 'R' 6 times during the game.)
(There is also an explanation in the game "readme".)
